long_description: With a fun, unique style and amazing comfort, the Chooze Scout shoes will be his go-to footwear for summer adventures. Scout shoes feature an all-over print; left and right shoes coordinate, but don't match. Cotton uppers and linings are soft and breathable, yet highly durable; dual stretch gores make them easy to slip on. EVA midsoles offer lightweight cushion for all-day comfort; lightweight wood plates provide support and stability. Rubber outsoles offer sure footings on varied terrain. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly.
short_description: With a fun, unique style and amazing comfort, the Chooze Scout shoes will be his go-to footwear for summer adventures.
